content: lion brand pattern # 50189-4c *chs-scallopedgeponchokids pdf* corrections applied sep 13 2005 skill level easy level 2 size child 4 child 5-6 child 7-8 circumference at neck edge 19½ 19½ 22 inches 49 5 49 5 56 cm length at center point 15 19½ 22½ inches 38 49 5 57 cm gauge 7 double_crochet + 4 row = 4 10 cm in block pattern stitch 7 5 single_crochet + 8 row = 4 inches 10 cm homespun® article #790 2 2 3 balls crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm stitches block shell worked in rounds starting at the neck edge chart for crochet edging is provided frequently asked questions information is provided there are other versions of this pattern based on size and craft kids size crochet #50189-4c & 70368ad this pattern child coming home poncho #70367ad crochet 2 in cotton-ease adult size crochet 3 plus size crochet 4 pet size crochet 5 kids size knit 6 adult size knit 7 plus size knit 8 pet size knit 9 *lion brand patterns are written in u s crochet terminology * *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/70368ad html noimages= 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/child-coming-home-poncho-70367ad 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/martha-stewart-coming-home-poncho-crochet 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/martha-stewart-coming-home-poncho-plus-size-crochet 5 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/martha-stewart-coming-home-pooch-poncho-crochet 6 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/martha-stewart-coming-home-poncho-kids-sizes-knit 7 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/martha-stewart-coming-home-poncho-knit 8 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/martha-stewart-coming-home-poncho-plus-size-knit 9 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/martha-stewart-coming-home-pooch-poncho-knit
